To track your calories and nutirents, add a food. Add Food Nutrient Details You can search any food by its name or brand product. You can also describe it and the AI assistant will generate it for you. Can\'t find your food? Try scanning the product barcode. Remove Summary Clear Edit Meal Are you sure? AI Add Portion Show more Minerals Vitamins Amino Acids BCAA Essentials Totals Hydration Meals of the day Food Weight Goals Set your daily macro and calorie goals. You can ask the assistant to help you decide Score Stats Observe overall trends and how macros affect your weight. Analytics - Trends Update This feature helps you determine a calorie goal or limit based on your macronutrient needs. If you already have a calorie amount you would want as a goal, use the other tab to calculate your goals This feature helps you determine you macronutrient percentages based on a calorie limit or goal. If you already have a macro amount you would want as a goal, use the other tab to calculate your goals Use Calories Use Macros Calorie Goal Current Goals Macronutrients Scores Set Goals Once set, you will have more data about you nutrition.
These Recommended Daily Amounts (RDAs) are based on the Codex Nutrient Reference Values (NRVs) established by the FAO/WHO for use in international nutrition labeling. Macronutrient Targets Food Products Database This copy is not licensed.\nPlease purchase on Google Play. Play Store
